name: connecTERRA
description:
A short game made for Global Game Jam 2023. 

Theme: Roots

connecTERRA is casual 2D game inspired by games like Mini Motorways and slither.io. You play as a bot that extends out cables and nodes to gather resources. Destroy obstacles in your way and strategize how to get into nooks and crannies around the level to reconnect to lost power nodes. 

- Team -

Programming, Art | Ben Gómez-Sanchez

Game Design, Sound Design, UI | Elaine Gómez-Sanchez

Musical theme under license via Pond5

Sound effects under license via SoundSnap

UI icons under free licensing via Flaticon and FreePik
